caption.center: ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. WILLIAM R. SUTTON, JR.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the Consent to Disbarment from the practice of law filed by William R. Sutton, Jr. in accordance with Maryland Rule 16-712 d2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 27th day of May, 1998
ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that William R. Sutton, Jr., be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further
ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of William R. Sutton, Jr. from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule 16-713, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients' Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.Page 4
